html:
10.30.20  6:34 pm   are you a god?

      i thought you were

10.30.20  6:32 pm   i like drawing and im super ininspired, then i saw your creativity and inspiration, and i just wanna ask how do you do it?? how do you keep maiking such original stuff?

      this may not be what you want to hear, but my life depends on it

10.30.20  6:06 pm   How do you create your animations?

      first i imagine 10,000 ways i wish it could be. then i realize all those ways are impossible for me to do. then after a brief moment of despair, i am sometimes able to find 1 way that is possible. and then i do it that way

10.30.20  6:00 pm   Do your songs have left/right audio?

     yes

      I have never noticed.

     that reminds me of the time i ate a potato and didn't notice the polyphenols

10.30.20  5:43 pm   Whats your best song?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be best

10.30.20  5:37 pm   I wrote a song. And it's too long (7 minutes). How do I shorten it?

      run it from the beginning, in real time, and stop as soon as you don't like it. then re-write from there

10.30.20  4:58 pm   how do i make good noises

      survey your environment by tapping things gently

10.30.20  4:02 pm   it might be an opinion, but do you realize how good and passionate you are, by answering all these questions everyday?

      holy herd of animals crossing the street, you are very friendly

10.30.20  3:40 pm   are you working on another video?

      oh hell yeah

10.30.20  3:38 pm   what do you think about podcasts?

     i call them talk shows but they are pretty good

     what do you think about being on podcasts yourself?

     that depends whether i get to be the host

10.30.20  3:20 pm   When will you upload your next video? 

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.30.20  3:12 pm   Why does life exist

      would be so ridiculous

10.30.20  2:52 pm   What would you do if you were immortal?

      everything, in due time

10.30.20  2:14 pm   What are your opinions on bread?

      middle of the road

10.30.20  1:51 pm   Is it possible to be "too school for cool" or vice versa?

      it is recommended to be exactly as cool as school

10.30.20  1:39 pm   what are you doing this Halloween?

      working on a music video for one of my songs

10.30.20  1:30 pm   when is your next video coming out?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.30.20  1:26 pm   what are your thoughts on canada

      in canada there is no speed limit. only maximum speed

10.30.20  1:07 pm   cool thing: im have good ideas. i even have one very specific FANTASTIC idea
bad thing: i have no idea how to make money from it even though it is valuable to people. if it makes no money i dont know how to get deliver this mail to people, i don't know how to get noticed. im lost

agony

      ah, this is where the golden rule comes in, which is don't have your best idea first

10.30.20  1:03 pm   what's your favourite sound

      fwong

10.30.20  12:34 pm   you like beethoven?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.30.20  12:12 pm   can i become a good musician without any background education in the subject and no training?

      of course

10.30.20  12:02 pm   how to do stuff

      impossible. it can't be done

10.30.20  11:54 am   What is the dumbest question you've ever gotten?

      i have never gotten a dumb question

10.30.20  11:44 am   When will your new video be finished?

      i don't know

10.30.20  11:15 am   how do you compose such great music

      start by composing anything. eventually it will become good. the universe guarantees this

10.30.20  10:51 am   are capital letters evil?

      no

10.30.20  10:26 am   what's the longest english word you know?

      curtail

10.30.20  10:10 am   what is the superior animal?

      machine

10.30.20  10:08 am   how come your songs are incredibly nostalgic

      could be some type of defense mechanism

10.30.20  8:48 am   when is the right time to wear a top hat?

      1860

10.30.20  8:32 am   how can I get the song "might quit" out of my damn head

      listen to a different song

10.30.20  6:32 am   Do you practice mindfulness?

      yes

10.30.20  5:49 am   why is reflection in mirror flipped horizontally but not vertically 

      because that's the direction you've pointed it

10.30.20  2:58 am   Does free will exist?

      i was going to say "i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes" but now that i think about it the answer is more simply yes

10.30.20  2:33 am   do you think i can be cool one day

      every day

10.30.20  1:26 am   Who are your musical inspirations?

      could be you

10.30.20  12:19 am   How can I be cool 

      that's easy. simply begin wearing your trousers at a different angle

10.29.20  11:56 pm   can you write an answer to this question without using the letter "e"?

      although that might sound a bit crazy, and also slightly ridiculous, i am willing to try it

10.29.20  11:51 pm   In a question from yesterday asking about memorizing major and minor scales, you answered that it would ruin the music and prevent genuine playing. This worries me because the way I try to orient myself on the piano and guitar is by completely relying on memorization of the major scale. For the key of the song and/or the chord of the current measure, I visualize the shape given by the major scale that corresponds with that chord as numbers from 1-7 (along with 9,11,13 I guess, and also stuff like #5, b3, etc.), and so those numbers go on different keys/frets depending on the key/current chord. I wouldn't really be sure how I'd find my way around without this orientation. Is this a bad way to be going about it,

     it would be bad for me, but, one of the wilder things i've learned in life is that different people are so different

     and if so, is there another method you would suggest that doesn't rely on the major scale?

     basically you could just start with one note. just play that note, now you know how it feels to play that note. so you have 2 options: playing the note, or playing nothing. think of the wonderous portraits you could paint, just from painting and not painting that note. Gradually, when you're ready, add another note to the notes you know. just learn what the notes sound like, 1 note at a time, and let them gradually assimilate themselves into your repetoire. the darn thing happens pretty much automatically the more time you spend around the instrument

10.29.20  11:11 pm   ¿Are you interested in learning another language?

     yes

     look at this character: ¿

10.29.20  10:57 pm   how is it that your songs can make me feel nostalgic and sad about things that never happened to me?

      that is the power of the mind

10.29.20  10:46 pm   why does everything keep breaking

      for you to enjoy fixing it

10.29.20  10:31 pm   Can you draw music?

      sure

10.29.20  9:53 pm   what kind of music do you like?

      regular

10.29.20  9:22 pm   Am I ugly...?

      no way

10.29.20  9:11 pm   what's your favorite facts you learn this month?

      if i don't figure out how to actually keep it simple and have it remain simple, i will never succeed. you may think i had already learned that, but i learned it again. which may or may not prepare me for my next lesson, which is to learn that same thing an additional time

10.29.20  9:10 pm   Right your learning 3d stuff or its just that your working on "a project" also nice website

      i'm learning how to make videos

10.29.20  8:22 pm   What do you think about weird people?

      that's what YOU think of them, but i don't know which people mean, because you only said your opinion without specifying which people they are

10.29.20  8:10 pm   Can I get an estimate for when your new vid is coming out because I miss you

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised
